description:
You currently can't include comments in the nova.conf configuration file, has been that way all the releases. Is there a way to pre-parse that file so that comments could be embedded in nova.conf? Would the performance hit be acceptable? Is this a gflags limitation? 

Thanks in advance - feel free to move to Answers if that's more appropriate.
title: Can't include comments in nova.conf
